command: secadm credentials update -rn netsim -rp netsim -sn netsim -sp netsim -nn netsim -xx netsim -n somenodename
secadm credentials update -rn netsim -rp netsim -sn netsim -sp netsim -nn netsim -np netsim -xx netsim -n somenodename

command: secadm credentials update --rootusername netsim --rootuserpassword netsim --secureusername netsim --secureuserpassword netsim --normaluserpassword netsim --normalusername netsim --normalusername netsim --nodelist somenodename
purpose: credentials update duplicate parameter long version

command: secadm credentials update -rn -rp netsim -sn netsim -sp netsim -nn netsim -np netsim -n somenodename

command: secadm credentials update -rn netsim -rp netsim -sn netsim -sp netsim -nn netsim -np netsim

command: secadm credentials update -rn netsim -rp netsim -sn netsim -sp netsim -nn netsim -np netsim -n

command: secadm credentials update -rn netsim -rp -sn netsim -sp netsim -nn netsim -np netsim -n somenodename

command: secadm credentials update -rn netsim -rp netsim -sn netsim -sp netsim -nn netsim -np netsim -n NetworkElement=somenodename;somenodename;MeContext=somenodename

command: secadm credentials update -rn netsim -rp netsim -sn netsim -sp netsim -nn netsim -np netsim -n NetworkElement=somenodename,somenodename1,,,,MeContext=somenodename2,
purpose: credentials update lots of commas between nodes

command: secadm credentials update -n NetworkElement=somenodename -rn netsim -rp netsim -sn netsim -sp netsim -nn netsim -np netsim
